derivation: a primitive root; properly, to choke; used only as denominative from H6060 (עָנָק),
outline:
1. to serve as a necklace, adorn with a neck ornament
    1. (Qal) to serve as a necklace
    2. (Hiphil) to make a necklace
kjv_def: compass about as a chain, furnish, liberally.
strongs_def: to collar, i.e. adorn with anecklace; figuratively, to fit out with supplies
